Summary: Close encounters of the third kind in Japan.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a Japanese. The report of experience which contacted by UFO and telepathy sent this mail this time. while driving to the Bon Festival rest of a company in Hakone in August, 1987, an alien is "UFO by telepathy -- it has been called -." When parking the car, opening the door and seeing the top, UFO was transparent and only its outline could be seen. It is transparent and the height of a size from a car is 8m in 8m for Adamski. The alien by whom it is surrounded by the steel rod in the inside of Ufo, who does not have sound and in whom chilly temperature and sound sound was husky voice. And it flew to the northeast. May, 1998 Washington Seattle, the United States & Boeing Tour has carried out. Then, Ufo was shouted. Can it consult with this affair? I cannot speak English. It is writing using translation software. A Japanese friend is in DC. Thank you seiji morohoshi
